title: Herpes zoster.

abstract: Herpes zoster is a disorder frequently encountered in adults. The natural history is often poorly appreciated and management is frustrating. Recent studies have critically evaluated newer therapeutic modalities. The epidemiology, clinical manifestations, complications and therapeutic alternatives of herpes zoster deserve review.
